column4: I have a very sad question to ask: How can I install windows XP on another disc without screwing up grub?
peeps I already have 10 different systems installed via VM, but VirtualBox doesn't support hardware accellerated 3d graphics. I really want to try out LOTR online beta
Does VMWare (versus VirtualBox) support hardware accellerated 3d for things like graphic intense games?
not used vmware, but vitrual box was slow for me, but maybe if i had better hardware it would habe been a better experience, but yet, it did work.
